item.title: Spirited USA Seek Pakistan Scalp After Opening Day Heartbreak
item.description: The USA cricket team aims for redemption against Pakistan following a tough opening day in the World Cup.

item.title: Faheem Ashraf Drags Unconvincing Pakistan Over the Line After Big Scare
item.description: Faheem Ashraf's heroics lead Pakistan to a narrow victory, overcoming challenges in a tense encounter.
